curl localhost:8080/hello
Aloha

```java
./mvnw clean package

docker build -f src/main/docker/Dockerfile.jvm -t example/greetings-app .
```

```java
FROM quay.io/quarkus/ubi-quarkus-native-image:19.2.1 as nativebuilder ![1](Images/1.png)
FROM quay.io/quarkus/ubi-quarkus-native-image:19.3.1-java11 as nativebuilder
RUN mkdir -p /tmp/ssl \
  && cp /opt/graalvm/lib/security/cacerts /tmp/ssl/

FROM registry.access.redhat.com/ubi8/ubi-minimal
WORKDIR /work/
COPY --from=nativebuilder /tmp/ssl/ /work/ ![2](Images/2.png)
COPY target/*-runner /work/application
RUN chmod 775 /work /work/application \ ![3](Images/3.png)
  && chown -R 1001 /work \
  && chmod -R "g+rwX" /work \
  && chown -R 1001:root /work
EXPOSE 8080 8443 ![4](Images/4.png)
USER 1001
CMD ["./application",
"-Dquarkus.http.host=0.0.0.0",
"-Djavax.net.ssl.trustStore=/work/cacerts"] ![5](Images/5.png)
```
